availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, bookkeeper. Pennsylvania native. Married to Mary Ellen Lyons Clayland in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 30, 1848. Father of Mary S. Clayland and Kate Clayland. Clerk in Louisville in 1850. Bookkeeper in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Louisville District 1, p. 146B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 1, p. 208.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film # 000482707, Jefferson County, October 30, 1848, p. 219 (accessed via ancestry.com).
